download_to_local

download_to_local.Rd

Download the google drive file to local storage

Usage

download_to_local(f_regex, download_dir)

Value

The path to the downloaded file

Examples

authenticate_google_drive()
#> [1] TRUE
test_file <- "openSRP_dictionary.xlsx"
fpath <- download_to_local(test_file, here::here())
#> File downloaded:
#> • openSRP_dictionary.xlsx <id: 1H0q6IR_1sexpbXXTEuqjs37sr02NHxKI>
#> Saved locally as:
#> • /net/rcstorenfs02/ifs/rc_labs/dominici_lab/lab/data_processing/csph_MDG-SurveyHarmonization/MAHERYCohortHarmonization/openSRP_dictionary.xlsx
#> File downloaded successfully to: /net/rcstorenfs02/ifs/rc_labs/dominici_lab/lab/data_processing/csph_MDG-SurveyHarmonization/MAHERYCohortHarmonization/openSRP_dictionary.xlsx
file.exists(fpath)
#> [1] TRUE
file.remove(fpath)
#> [1] TRUE
